name: QS Discover and Connect for Masters and MBA in Toronto
content: Register at this link: https://bit.ly/3V2aoZM Learn more about graduate school admissions, financing options, and attend career and personal branding panels. Get a step ahead of your competition and meet admissions representatives face-to-face. You'll also become eligible for exclusive scholarships and a free professional headshot taken onsite, just for attending! The event is free, but spots are limited, so make sure to register now. Save your place by registering today: https://bit.ly/3V2aoZM Time: 11:30 AM - 5:30 PM Venue Details: Metro Toronto Convention Centre (MTCC) South Building, 222 Bremner Boulevard, Toronto, Ontario, M5V 2T6, Canada Price: Free: CAD 0.00
